CTFO

Relationship advice iPhone app.

Situation

CTFO (Chill The F*ck Out) is a provocative app, that allows user to get a crowd advice on a tough relationship situation. Users allowed to “vote” on situations with TFU (Thatâ€™s F*cked Up) or CTFO only.
